description: This file defines an Android Fragment named CategoriesFragment that manages a list of categories, including displaying, adding, and deleting categories. It also contains the CategoriesAdapter class for binding category data to RecyclerView items.

classes.name: CategoriesFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment responsible for displaying, adding, and deleting categories within the UI.

classes.name: CategoriesAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView Adapter class for displaying category items with delete functionality.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes RecyclerView and input controls, sets up ViewModel observers and click listeners.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter with new list of categories.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates new ViewHolder instances for category items.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds category data to the ViewHolder's views and sets up delete button actions.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the current number of category items.
